SELECT /* BestAppMapper.xml, selectBestAppList, SAC 전시, 2014-03-27 */ KA.TOTAL_COUNT /* 조회 건수 */ ,KA.TOP_MENU_ID /* 상위 MENU ID */ ,KA.MENU_ID /* MENU_ID */ ,KA.PROD_ID /* 상품 ID */ FROM ( SELECT JA.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM ,IA.* FROM ( SELECT /*+ USE_NL(K,I,H,F) ORDERED */ COUNT(B.PROD_ID) OVER () AS TOTAL_COUNT ,A.EXPO_ORD ,A.TENANT_ID ,A.PROD_ID ,A.MENU_ID ,F.TOP_MENU_ID ,H.SUB_CONTENTS_ID FROM ( SELECT A.TENANT_ID ,A.PROD_ID ,A.MENU_ID ,A.EXPO_ORD FROM TB_DP_LIST_PROD A WHERE A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} /* header param : tenantId */ AND A.LIST_ID = #{listId} /* param : listId */ AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' /* 전시여부 */ AND A.STD_DT = TO_DATE(#{stdDt}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') /* 기준일시 */ ) A ,TB_DP_PROD B ,TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG E ,TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY F ,TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE H ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD I ,TB_CM_DEVICE K WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.SVC_GRP_CD ='DP000201' /* 서비스 그룹코드 : 앱 */
AND B.PROD_GRD_CD IN
#{prodGradeCd}
AND A.PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND A.MENU_ID = E.MENU_ID AND E.MENU_ID = F.MENU_ID AND F.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.PROD_ID = H.PROD_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = I.TENANT_ID AND A.PROD_ID = I.PROD_ID AND I.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' /* PD000403 : 판매중 */ AND F.TOP_MENU_ID != 'DP02' /* DP02 : 폰꾸미기 */ AND H.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = K.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND K.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} /* header param : 단말모델코드 */ AND K.USE_YN = 'Y' AND I.EXPO_YN = 'Y' /* 노출여부 */ ORDER BY A.EXPO_ORD ) IA ) JA WHERE JA.RNUM BETWEEN #{offset} AND #{count} /* param : offset, count */ ) KA

SELECT /* BestAppMapper.xml, selectNewBestAppList, SAC 전시, 2014-03-27 */ KA.TOTAL_COUNT /* 조회 건수 */ ,KA.TOP_MENU_ID /* 상위 MENU ID */ ,KA.MENU_ID /* MENU_ID */ ,KA.PROD_ID /* 상품 ID */ FROM ( SELECT TA.* FROM ( SELECT COUNT(JA.PROD_ID) OVER () AS TOTAL_COUNT /* 조회건수 */ ,ROWNUM AS RNUM ,JA.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY IA.SELLER_MBR_NO ORDER BY IA.UPD_DT DESC ) AS RN ,IA.* FROM ( SELECT B.SELLER_MBR_NO ,B.UPD_DT ,A.EXPO_ORD ,A.TENANT_ID ,A.PROD_ID ,A.MENU_ID ,F.TOP_MENU_ID ,H.SUB_CONTENTS_ID FROM ( SELECT A.TENANT_ID ,A.PROD_ID ,A.MENU_ID ,A.EXPO_ORD FROM TB_DP_LIST_PROD A WHERE A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} /* header param : tenantId */ AND A.LIST_ID = #{listId} /* param : listId */ AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' /* 전시여부 */ AND A.STD_DT = TO_DATE(#{stdDt}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') /* 기준일시 */ ) A ,TB_DP_PROD B ,TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG E ,TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY F ,TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE H ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD I ,TB_CM_DEVICE K WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.SVC_GRP_CD ='DP000201'
AND B.PROD_GRD_CD IN
#{prodGradeCd}
AND A.PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND A.MENU_ID = E.MENU_ID AND E.MENU_ID = F.MENU_ID AND F.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.PROD_ID = H.PROD_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = I.TENANT_ID AND A.PROD_ID = I.PROD_ID AND I.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' /* PD000403 : 판매중 */ AND F.TOP_MENU_ID != 'DP02' /* DP02 : 폰꾸미기 */ AND H.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = K.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND K.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} /* header param : 단말모델코드 */ AND K.USE_YN = 'Y' AND I.EXPO_YN = 'Y' /* 노출여부 */ ORDER BY A.EXPO_ORD ) IA ) JA WHERE JA.RN <= 2 ) TA WHERE TA.RNUM BETWEEN #{offset} AND #{count} /* param : offset, count */ ) KA
